title: Tour de France ticker: Caleb Ewan headlines Lotto-Dstny, 60,000 ‘ikurriñas’ to line roads, FDJ leave Démare home to back Gaudu, Pinot
content:
Follow all the Tour de France hype ahead of the Bilbao 'grand départ' on July 1.

Read the full article at Tour de France ticker: Caleb Ewan headlines Lotto-Dstny, 60,000 ‘ikurriñas’ to line roads, FDJ leave Démare home to back Gaudu, Pinot on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
